table.name: sys_action
table.Comment: 系统表-操作表，权限拦截用，存放系统里全部动作。

column.name: allowcomments
column.Comment: 是否允许评论(0:不允许,1:允许)

column.name: status
column.Comment: 状态(-1:不通过,0未审核,1:通过)

column.name: pid
column.Comment: 回复楼中楼编号回复楼中楼编号

column.name: status
column.Comment: 状态(-1:不通过,0:未审核,1:通过)

column.name: comment_state
column.Comment: 评论状态 -- 0：未评论 2：已评论

column.name: type
column.Comment: 权限类型(-1:减权限,1:增权限)
